column1: Smoque BBQ////Their ribs: Carolina and St. Louis-style both use dry rubs consisting of spices
column2: tomatoes and vinegar in a very balanced fashion. What's particularly special about these ribs is that you can really taste the smokiness of the meat. Unlike other popular styles of BBQ
column3: the meat here do not come off the bone completely
column4: which I learned that the chefs have done intentionally to give the meat more texture.
